dt-example.title: Complex table headers
dt-example.info: This example demonstrates the use of `colspan` and `rowspan` in a DataTable and its effect on the exported data. PDF, Excel and Copy allow allow for column and row spanning elements in the table header. There is however no concept of this in CSV, so it will export just a single row for the header / footer.
